name: Project Rouge Sapphire
description:
## Project Rouge Sapphire

is a One Man Project of Game Design Student iRaz, who is currently in the 4th Semester of his Bachelor. For this Campaign there are 8 weeks of development, since there are 8 weeks of Projectphase, after that the project will be went live and / or completly worked over, based on the feedback of the community. Rouge Sapphire is a working title, the original title is classified. Part One (3 Missions) is currently in development by iRaz of Pyrphoros Development Team One, a direct daughter of Pyrphoros Entertainment.

#### Publisher

Mediadesign Hochschule Berlin & Pyrphoros Entertainment

#### Developer

Pyrphoros Development (Team One) & iRaz Xperiments
author: _ForgeUser26698312
